title: Roman Album No. 4: Italian Landscapes and Antiquities
medium: album of 61 drawings and 21 tracings in an album consisting of 22 pages in all, with 21 rectos and 2 versos bearing drawings
dimensions:
overall (size of closed album): 52.2 x 35.5 cm (20 9/16 x 14 in.)
page size (greenish pages): 48.6 x 33 cm (19 1/8 x 13 in.)
page size (white pages): 50.5 x 33.4 cm (19 7/8 x 13 1/8 in.)
